categories.name: Governance & Oversight
categories.description: Leadership, accountability, and oversight for cybersecurity and AI risk management.

categories.name: Policies & Procedures
categories.description: Documented policies, standards, and operating procedures governing security and AI.

categories.name: Risk Assessment & Risk Management
categories.description: Processes for identifying, analyzing, and prioritizing cybersecurity and AI risks.

categories.name: Asset / System Inventory
categories.description: Cataloging and tracking hardware, software, data assets, and AI systems.

categories.name: Data Management & Data Quality
categories.description: Managing data lifecycle, quality, lineage, classification, and retention.

categories.name: Access Control & Identity
categories.description: Identity governance, authentication, authorization, and privileged access.

categories.name: Technical Security Controls
categories.description: Security technologies including network, endpoint, cloud, model security, and hardening.

categories.name: Monitoring, Logging & Detection
categories.description: Continuous monitoring, event logging, anomaly detection, and alerting.

categories.name: Model Risk Management
categories.description: AI lifecycle controls including validation, drift monitoring, explainability, and fairness.

categories.name: Privacy & Legal Compliance
categories.description: Compliance with privacy laws, AI regulations, and contractual/legal obligations.

categories.name: Vendor & Supply Chain Risk
categories.description: Third-party due diligence, monitoring, and supply-chain security.

categories.name: Incident Response & Business Continuity
categories.description: Incident handling, disaster recovery, continuity planning, and crisis communication.
